name: Dreadnought
summary: Dreadnought is a combat flight simulation game developed by Six Foot and Yager Development, and published by Grey Box. Following a closed beta phase, the game was released for PlayStation 4 in December 2017, followed by a release for Microsoft Windows in October 2018.
info:
• 中文名: 无畏舰
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 游戏类型: Combat flight simulation
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2017年6月6日
  • 官方网站: https://www.greybox.com/dreadnought
